title: Jack Wall - Myst IV Revelation Official Soundtrack [2004]
description:
This is official score (it&#039;s not a music cut from the game) from beautiful adventure game Myst 4: Revelation.
Track "Welcome" played (and sung in Polish) by Polish folk band "Warsaw Village Band".

Composer: Jack Wall
Year: 2004
Total time approx.: 65 mins.
Label: UbiSoft
format: mp3 (128kbit/s)
